mail_body:
Dear Mr. Smith,

We are thrilled to be assisting you with your relocation to Austin, Texas! This email confirms your upcoming move and outlines the next steps in the process.

As discussed, your dedicated relocation specialist, Sarah Jones, will be in touch with you on Monday, October 28th at 10:00 AM CST to finalize your housing preferences and discuss your preferred move-in date. She will also be coordinating the transportation of your belongings.

We have already secured a furnished apartment for you near downtown Austin, pending your final approval. The address is 123 Main Street, Austin, TX 78701. You can view photos and details on our portal at [link to portal].

We are committed to making your transition as smooth as possible. Please don't hesitate to reach out to Sarah or myself if you have any questions.

Sincerely,
The Relocation Team
Example Relocation Services
mail_summary: Confirmation email outlining next steps in relocation to Austin, including contact with relocation specialist and apartment details.
